#summary pa.iscde.documentation.tags


= Introduction =

This plugin is used to create a new documentation tag for the Documentation View. To use this plugin, you'll need to provide a tag, with a name, and an implementation of the object ITagContentProvider, that consists giving a Title and a Description, both in HTML, if you consider that.
If your tag exists in the file that is in context (open in Java Editor), you'll see your implementation of this in Documentation View.


= Details =

   public String getHtmlTitle()
   In this method you will implement the title name that will appear in the Documentation View, when this tag exists.

   public StringBuilder getHtml(String description)
   In this method you will implement how you want the desctiption appear in the Documentation View, when the tag exists.
